main.name: Vas Toumpelis

main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a passionate developer with experience in front and back-end web development of e-commerce applications, with 4 years experience of working with APIs and integrations.

education.description: Relevant modules included: Software Engineering, Object-Oriented Programming, Application Programming, Web Programming, Databases, Mobile Robotics, Individual and Group Projects.

work.title: Developer
work.description: Working as part of a team responsible for delivering API-first e-commerce and bespoke web development solutions. Used JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Knockout.js and APIs to develop and integrate solutions based on the Oracle Commerce Cloud platform. Experienced in front and back-end development, following industry-standard development workflows and best practices

work.title: CX Consultant
work.description: Responsible for communicating with internal team, supervising and training analysts in order to lead implementation projects of Oracle CRM solutions. Continuously interacting with customers to discuss, analyse and meet their requirements.

work.title: CX Analyst
work.description: Responsible for communicating with internal team, supervising and training analysts in order to lead implementation projects of Oracle CRM solutions. Continuously interacting with customers to discuss, analyse and meet their requirements.
